CustomField.formula: IF(AND(BMCServiceDesk__state__c, BMCServiceDesk__dueDateTime__c < NOW()), IMAGE("/resource/BMCServiceDesk__SDEFStyles/SDEFbuttons/light_red.gif", "Due date of a record has passed"), IF(AND(BMCServiceDesk__state__c, BMCServiceDesk__Time_Remaining_Percentage__c > 50), IMAGE("/resource/BMCServiceDesk__SDEFStyles/SDEFbuttons/light_green.gif", "More than 50% of time is remaining in the due date"), IF(AND(BMCServiceDesk__state__c, BMCServiceDesk__Time_Remaining_Percentage__c <= 50), IMAGE("/resource/BMCServiceDesk__SDEFStyles/SDEFbuttons/light_yellow.gif", "Less than or equal to 50% of time is remaining in the due date"), IF(AND(!BMCServiceDesk__state__c, BMCServiceDesk__closeDateTime__c <= BMCServiceDesk__dueDateTime__c), IMAGE("/resource/BMCServiceDesk__SDEFStyles/SDEFbuttons/permissions_confirm16.gif", "Due date met"), IF(AND(!BMCServiceDesk__state__c, BMCServiceDesk__closeDateTime__c > BMCServiceDesk__dueDateTime__c), IMAGE("/resource/BMCServiceDesk__SDEFStyles/SDEFbuttons/permissions_deny16.gif", "Due date is not met"), '')))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Shows status of incident in a graphical format.
CustomField.label: Due Date Progress
